original_text: And this is love: that we walk in obedience to his commands. As you have heard from the beginning, his command is that you walk in love.
korean_text: 또 사랑은 이것이니 우리가 그 계명을 따라 행하는 것이요 계명은 이것이니 너희가 처음부터 들은 바와 같이 그 가운데서 행하라 하심이라

sentences.original_text: that we walk in obedience to his commands
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 그의 명령에 순종하며 행하는 것입니다

sentences.original_text: As you have heard from the beginning
his command is that you walk in love
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 명령은 너희가 사랑 속에서 행하는 것입니다
